reviews.review_msg: Dr. Krusi was a great prof you can tell she really cares about the topics she lectures on, and has real life experiences in the field. Her lectures are interesting which is great since she doesn't post recordings and have to be present & pay attention in class to do well. When I argued my papers grade she was extremely sweet while explaining.

Professor Krusi is amazing, my favourite so far. You can tell she is very passionate about what she's teaching. Slides often had only a few things, which she posted on Canvas, but no audio recording. Textbook was enjoyable to read and understand. The final was straightforward if you studied well. Lots of theories, but super interesting!

She is amazing! Really cares about students and tries to make lectures interesting. Assignments have clear guidelines and the TA gave good feedback. Exams were not too difficult but the short answers are often from lecture examples so going to class is a good idea.

Super nice prof, you can tell she really enjoys her job and is passionate on the subject. TA's were super helpful. you just need to pay attention during lectures as there isn't much on the slides and the tests are mainly based on lecture material.

Andrea is so easy to approach and very willing to help in any area students might need. The TAs were fair markers, though it might be harder to get As than you'd expect. Make sure to follow instructions and start the major paper early and you'll be fine

professor Krusï was great! lectures were engaging and tutorial work really helped and applied to class. I would say that lectures are mandatory as there is not much info on the slides, tests were more based off of lecturing.
She was very nice and gave clear lectures. Her TA's are great and are very clear about the important information from the lectures and give constructive criticism to improve on essays.

Andrea is such an amazing prof with easy-to-follow lectures and engaging content. She is very approachable and makes learning extremely fun! Her TAs were incredible, and she, as well as the TAs are fair and clear with their marking. She will do everything she can to prepare you for exams. Would love to take a class with her again!!
Dr Krüsi is amazing! Her lectures are easy to follow and you can tell she is passionate about her job. Exams and assignments are fair and the TAs were incredible. Highly recommend.
